column2: Position Overview:  Head of Operations is a key leadership position responsible for overseeing and managing the operational aspects of events. This role involves in-depth project industry knowledge, planning and execution of project, operational commercials, coordination with various vendors of events to ensure their successful and smooth execution and financial controls with risk mitigation abilities.  Here are some of the primary responsibilities and duties typically associated with the position Key Responsibilities: 1. Event Planning: Collaborating with client and event stakeholders to understand the objectives, scope, and requirements of the event. Developing comprehensive event plans that outline the logistical details, timelines, and resources needed. 2. Budget Management: Creating and managing the entire project and operations budget, ensuring all expenses are accounted for and kept within the allocated budget limits. 3. Project Execution: Negotiating contracts with vendors, suppliers, and service providers. Managing relationships with vendors and overseeing their performance during the event. Creation and up-dation of event status vis--vis plan. Daily transparent and real time updates on event status to client servicing teams. 4. Logistics Coordination: Coordinating transportation, accommodation, and other logistical arrangements for attendees, speakers, and performers. 5. Staff Supervision: Leading and managing a team of event staff, including coordinators, assistants, and volunteers. Assigning tasks, providing guidance, and ensuring efficient teamwork. 6. Risk Assessment and Mitigation: Identifying potential risks and challenges associated with the event and implementing strategies to mitigate them. Preparing contingency plans to address any unforeseen issues. 7. Health and Safety Compliance: Ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations and standards to create a secure and risk-free environment for attendees. 8. Technology and Equipment Management: Overseeing the use and maintenance of event-related technology, audio-visual equipment, and other necessary tools. 9. On-site Event Management: Being present during the event to oversee the setup, execution, and breakdown phases. Handling any last-minute issues that may arise. 10. Post-Event Evaluation: Conducting a post-event analysis to assess the event's success and identify areas for improvement. Gathering feedback from stakeholders, attendees, and team members. Discuss the same with Client Servicing team for combined learning for future. 11. Innovation and Creativity: Staying updated with the latest event management trends, technologies, and best practices to enhance the overall event experience. Qualification & Work Experience: 1. Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Event Management or Hospitality 2. Additional certifications in event planning or project management 3. 10 - 15 years of experience with minimum 5+ experience in managing operations of events at different scale 4. Significant experience in event management is crucial to assume a leadership role. Candidates should have a proven track record of successfully organizing and executing various types of events, including large-scale conferences, corporate events, media launches, trade shows, etc. 5. As a head of operations, strong leadership skills are vital to effectively manage a team of event professionals, delegate tasks, motivate team members, and create a positive and productive work environment. 6. Exceptional organizational abilities are critical for managing timelines, budgets, contracts, and logistics efficiently. 7. Ability to think quickly on your feet and solve problems effectively. 8. Proficiency in budget management is essential for overseeing event expenses, negotiating contracts with vendors, and allocating resources efficiently. 9. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation abilities. 10. In-depth knowledge of the event management industry, including current trends, best practices, and emerging technologies, is essential for staying ahead and delivering successful events. 11. Ability to work under pressure and handle multiple projects simultaneously. 12. Flexibility to travel and work extended hours during peak event seasons. Location  -  Mumbai Suburbs, Mumbai All Areas.
column11: Event Operations, vendor management, event management, event planning, event sales, weddings, event execution, event head, budgeting, event coordinator, Events, ATL, BTL

column2: Position: The Manager - Events will be responsible for owning, designing and delivering high-impact, virtual/physical,  internal and external events for Merilytics, and will work closely with the internal stakeholders, 3rd party  agencies & vendors to drive them to successful completion.  Location: Hyderabad, Telangana  Roles and Responsibilities   Responsible for end-to-end management of internal & external facing events, including but not  limited to strategy, creative concept, calendar and timelines, budgeting, logistics, vendor management, and overall operational coordination, to ensure successful outcome   Work closely with department heads and internal stakeholders to conceptualize, develop and  conduct the event based on defined goals and deliverables, and within timelines.   Create compelling and innovative experiences for events based on business intent   Develop feedback mechanism to synthesize learning's from events and incorporate in future  activities   Ensure events reflect the company branding guidelines  Pre-requisites and skillsets required to apply for this role:   Full-time Bachelors degree    4-5 years??experience in event management (in corporate space preferably)   Creative thinking to customize events based on strategic intent   Proficiency with Email and Microsoft Office applications (Excel, Word and PowerPoint).   Good communication (written and verbal), negotiation skills and interpersonal skills.   Excellent project management skills with ability to work on simultaneous projects in a high-paced,  rapidly evolving agile environment   Team player with an ability to work independently and manage business ambiguities with a selfstarter approach. Why Explore a Career at Merilytics:   High growth environment: Semi-annual performance management and promotion cycles coupled  with a strong meritocratic culture, enables fast track to leadership responsibility   High quality of work experience: Interesting and challenging nature of work, that always keeps you  excited and motivated.   Entrepreneurial Environment: Intellectual freedom to make decisions and own them. We expect  you to spread your wings and assume larger responsibilities.   Fun culture and peer group: non-bureaucratic and fun working environment; Strong peer  environment that will challenge you and accelerate your learning curve

COMPETENCIES (SKILLS AND ABILITIES) :? column2: Position Title:   Community Manager - Epigamia Campus Ambassador Program   Primary Responsibilities:   Design and implement strategies to recruit, train, and manage Epigamia Campus Ambassadors across various college campuses.  Role & responsibilities  : Develop program guidelines, goals, and key performance indicators (KPIs) to ensure effective execution and alignment with brand objectives.   Develop comprehensive training materials and resources to onboard new Campus Ambassadors and equip them with the necessary knowledge, skills, and tools to excel in their roles.   Coordinate recruitment efforts to attract high-potential candidates for the program by collaborating with college partners and student organizations  Conduct orientation sessions, workshops, and ongoing coaching to support ambassador development and engagement.  Serve as the primary point of contact for Campus Ambassadors, providing guidance, support, and mentorship throughout their ambassadorship journey.   Facilitate regular communication, feedback channels, and community-building activities to foster a sense of belonging and camaraderie among ambassadors  Monitor and evaluate the performance of Campus Ambassadors against established KPIs like event attendance, social media engagement, product distribution, and feedback collection. Analyze data insights to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement, and adjust strategies accordingly.  Build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including college administrators, student leaders, brand representatives, and external partners.  Collaborate cross-functionally with internal teams such as marketing, sales, and operations to align campus initiatives with broader organizational goals.  Provide logistical support, resource allocation, and promotional materials to ensure the success of each event while adhering to brand guidelines and safety protocols.  Champion the Epigamia brand within the college community and beyond, promoting brand values, initiatives, and products through strategic partnerships, sponsorships, and ambassador-led activities. Cultivate a positive brand image and enhance brand affinity among students, faculty, and alumni.  Preferred candidate profile:   Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, business, or a related field.  2+ years of experience in community management, brand ambassador programs, or event marketing, preferably in the beverage or consumer goods industry.  Strong leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to inspire, motivate, and empower a diverse group of ambassadors.  Excellent communication abilities, including public speaking, writing, and presentation skills.  Proven track record of project management, event planning, and stakeholder engagement.  Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving measurable outcomes and continuous improvement.  Passion for youth culture, sports, music, and lifestyle trends, with a deep understanding of college campus dynamics and student preferences.  Flexibility to travel and work evenings and weekends as needed.  Benefits:   Opportunity to work with a great brand and make a meaningful impact on college campuses.  Professional development and growth opportunities within the Epigamia organization.  Collaborative and inclusive work environment with a diverse team of passionate individuals.

column2: Company   Overview: Oben   Electric , a trailblazing electric motorcycle manufacturer, was established in August 2020 by visionary alumni from prestigious institutions like IIT and IIM. Headquartered in Bengaluru, we are driven by relentless innovation and a commitment to excellence towards 'Design   in   India   for   the   World'. With a robust R&D infrastructure, we design, develop, and manufacture electric motorcycles and critical EV components in-house, holding over 25+ patents for our proprietary technology. Oben Electric is driving the widespread adoption of electric motorcycles across India and beyond. Join us in shaping the future of mobility and be a part of our journey towards sustainable transportation solutions. Website:  www.obenelectric.com Job Title: Senior Brand Executive Company: Oben Electric Job Summary: We are seeking a dynamic and creative Senior Brand Executive to join our team at Oben Electric, an electric motorcycle company based in Bangalore. The ideal candidate will have 1-3 years of experience in Digital, ATL & BTL marketing, with a strong understanding of executing marketing strategies aimed at targeted audience engagement. As a brand executive, you will be responsible for implementing innovative and effective marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness & drive sales. Key Responsibilities: 1. Communicate our Brand Positioning and mission. 2. Plan the annual marketing calendar and formulate actionable marketing plans  (ATL + BTL with a strong digital focus) to deliver on brand and business  objectives. 3. Drive brand ATL campaigns (Digital, Radio, OOH, Digital, etc) from strategy to  execution with creative and media partners. 4. Plan and implement BTL activities such as events, roadshows, dealer activations,  store fabrication, branding and experiential marketing campaigns to engage with  the target audience directly. 5. Analyse market trends, consumer behaviour, and competitor activities to identify  new opportunities and optimise campaigns for maximum impact. 6. Collaborate with the sales team to align BTL activities with sales objectives and  generate leads through effective promotional efforts. 7. Manage merchandise printing and sourcing, ensuring the timely production of  promotional materials such as branded merchandise, giveaways, and  promotional items for BTL activities. 8. Manage influencers and collaborate with them to create quality content aimed at increasing awareness about Oben Rorr and brand. Develop strategic partnerships and creative campaigns to leverage influencer reach and engagement.   9. Plan and execute campaigns for festival days, leveraging cultural events and holidays to enhance brand visibility and capitalize on seasonal opportunities. Coordinate with cross-functional teams to develop themed promotions, offers, and activations that resonate with target audiences during festive periods. 10. Contribute to the development of creative concepts, messaging, and collateral for campaigns, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and marketing objectives. Qualifications and Skills: 1. bachelors degree in marketing, Communications, Business Administration, or a related field. 2. Proven experience of 1-3 years in brand marketing, preferably within the automotive or two-wheeler industry. 3. Strong understanding of below-the-line marketing techniques, including event management, experiential marketing, and promotional activities. 4. Excellent project management skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment. 5. Creative thinking and innovative mindset with a passion for developing engaging marketing campaigns. 6. Proficiency in using analytics tools and metrics to measure the effectiveness of BTL activities and drive data-driven decision-making. 7. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with internal and external stakeholders. 8. Detail-oriented with a focus on quality and accuracy in all aspects of work. 9. Flexibility to travel and work outside regular hours as required for events and activations. 10. Familiarity with electric vehicles or sustainable mobility initiatives would be an advantage. Join us at Oben Electric and be part of a team dedicated to revolutionizing the future of urban mobility with innovative electric motorcycles. If you have the passion and skills to drive impactful BTL marketing campaigns, we'd love to hear from you!

column2: Job Title: Branch Head   (Event Management agency) Location: Mumbai Experience Level: 14+ years   Job Type:   Full-Time  -  5 days working - Office in Mumbai is yet to be opened. Bangalore based firm with offices in Delhi and Mumbai (upcoming), Singapore (upcoming) Reports to: Senior Vice-President    Please note event management experience is mandatory. This is a branch operations role in an event management agency/industry that specializes in handling end-to-end large scale tech events for tech companies like google, IBM, Dell etc. Please dont apply if you do not have experience in Events. Job Description:   We are currently seeking an experienced Branch Head to join our dynamic team. The candidate will be primarily responsible for overseeing all agency operational services and activities related to a key account.  Key Responsibilities:   Participates in formulating and administering company policies and developing long-range goals and objectives. Maintains an external awareness of the event management industry and related production trends, materials, techniques, technology etc.  Reviews analysis of activities, costs, operations, and forecast data to determine progress towards stated goals and objectives.  Provides guidance for production and quality control standards, develops budget and cost controls, and obtains data regarding services ordered.  Provides guidance in the development of an event process plan, including personnel requirements, material needs, subcontract requirements, facility needs, and tooling and equipment needs.  Ensures all established costs, quality, and delivery commitments are met.  Reviews production and operating reports and directs the resolution of operational, manufacturing, and maintenance problems to ensure minimum costs further preventing operational delays.  Negotiations with vendor on cost - minimize costs despite provision of superior quality deliverables for client.  Provide cost Justification to client.  Provide production feasibility feedback before the final plan is developed.  Provide innovative solutions to fulfill client/creative aspirations. Ensure insurance, legal, health and safety obligations are adhered to.  Ensure that constant development in production tools enables to be better than competitors. Ensure acceptable profitability levels for each project. Review pre-event materials: revised and final costs, copy of pro-formas, layouts, copy of designs, copy of all prior communication with client, list of materials required for setup, vendor delivery schedule and set up schedule.  Ensure timely delivery of materials of desired quality by vendor.  Determines responsibilities of assigned organization and staff positions to accomplish business objectives. Ensures that the responsibilities, authorities, and accountability of all direct subordinates are defined and understood. Final set up, matches creatives approved by client.  Smooth and cohesive event flow with no glitches  Dismantling of setup in orderly and timely manner  Participate in event de-brief. Closing event with all necessary bills and documents within the prescribed time frame Qualifications:   Graduation (Any) Post-Graduation from Event Management Institute Vendor base knowledge  Latest technology knowledge Expertise in costing  Ability to provide innovative solutions to fulfill client/creative aspirations.  Good at multi-tasking and coordination Experience in negotiating contracts and handling budgets Good communication skills  Leadership and organizational skills Good at Microsoft Windows applications Dedicated attention to detail Perform well in individual or team environment. Time and Resource Optimization Highly analytical team player with aptitude for quickly scrutinizing environments to identify and prioritize needs/risks and develop solutions. Ability to handle / supervise projects with team (starting from concept to execution to closing all by himself/ herself) Creativity to think out of the box and execution excellence to achieve desired goals. Inter-personal maturity and organizational skill  If you find the above profile suitable then please share your resumes at saumya@hr-central.in Please note event management experience in the event industry is mandatory.   About our client: A data, design and technology-driven  event/advertising company  that brands with their communities through events and experiential marketing, integrated campaigns, direct marketing, digital and social media marketing, lead and demand generation, data building and profiling, revenue focused campaigns and audience acquisition. A 60 people strong, 13 years old and well established  event/advertising company . Over the last decade, we have designed and delivered experiential marketing campaigns for brands like Red Hat, Google, Microsoft, AWS, VMware, Salesforce, Tableau, Automation Anywhere, IBM, Cisco, Nvidia and other noteworthy fortune brands. We create brand experiences that help brands establish their voice, get closer to their communities, and bring their marketing vision to life. Industry : Event/ Advertising Services Company size :  60 employees Headquarters :  Bengaluru, Karnataka Founded :  2010

column2: JOB TITLE:  Marketing Executive   REPORTS TO TITLE: Marketing Manager BUSINESS FUNCTION/ SUB-FUNCTION: Marketing and Student Recruitment LOCATION:  Noida Job description Roles and Responsibilities: -  Working closely with our Marketing Manager and production team, you will create copy and accompanying imagery to optimize our communications channels and hone our brands tone of voice, whilst managing our content calendar. - Ensure collateral items are printed and distributed on time and to briefed location - Ensure effective communication with key stakeholders (internal and external) producing briefing materials and updates as required. - Maintaining database of collateral and campaign archive ensuring It is well maintained and easily accessible. - Work closely with cross-functional teams to uphold and enhance the brand image. - Translate our core messaging and product into a mix of educational, conversational, and sales-focused emails centered on leveraging brand & product USPs and needs. - Assist in communicating updates and plans with stakeholders, ensuring that on ground business development teams are briefed appropriately. - Act as the first point of contact for all enquiries relating to collateral ensuring all items are correctly briefed and ready for scheduling. - To demonstrate professionalism in the role as a representative of GBS, incorporating GBS core values in the delivery of duties. - To observe equality and diversity practices and procedures and always promote equality of opportunity. WHO YOU ARE: At least 2-3 years of marketing experience, ideally B2B and ed-tech Experience across a broad range of marketing channels, print and events. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbally Experience in using marketing automation, CRMs, and sales automation tools (Zoho & Salesforce is an advantage) Experience in collaborating closely with sales teams, including briefing on programs, and translating strategic requirements into tactical event execution. Results driven and a strong team player, demonstrating good collaboration skills. Able to understand the bigger picture to build comms strategy and deliver value to the business. Strong understanding of B2B marketing, especially in a start-up/scale-up organization Organized, able to priorities and deliver quickly.

column2: About the job:  We seek a dynamic and enthusiastic Marketing Executive to join our team. As a Marketing Executive, you will organize seminars led by the renowned Dr. MD Ahmed, a Guinness world record holder, doctoral scholar, and multiple book author who received executive education from Wharton Business School. This role involves extensive travel in India and abroad to interact with educationists, influencers, and principals to promote and arrange these seminars. Key responsibilities: 1. Engage with educationists and principals to discuss and organize seminars featuring Dr. MD 2. Plan and execute marketing strategies to generate interest in seminar participation 3. Travel domestically and internationally to build relationships with key stakeholders in the education sector 4. Negotiate event bookings and prices with various venues and institutions 5. Coordinate logistics and ensure smooth execution of seminars 6. Collaborate with the sales team to achieve attendance targets and revenue goals 7. Continuously learn and develop persuasion and marketing skills to maximize the impact of the seminars 8. Take ownership of building and expanding a robust professional network in the education industry 9. Contribute to creating marketing materials and promotional content for the seminars 10. Provide regular updates and reports on marketing activities and event performance Skill(s) required Effective Communication Organising Managing Who can apply 1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field 2. Undergraduates with effective communication and selling, organizing, and managing skills can also apply 3. Proven experience in marketing, sales, or event management, preferably in the education sector 4. Strong communication and interpersonal skills to engage effectively with educationists and principals 5. Demonstrated ability to negotiate and close deals 6. Willingness to travel extensively within India and abroad 7. Eagerness to learn and develop persuasion and marketing skills to excel in the role 8. Highly organized and capable of handling multiple tasks simultaneously 9. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment 10. column2: Growth Manager- Events and outreach About NxtWave NxtWave is one of Indias fastest-growing Ed-Tech startups. NxtWave is revolutionizing the 21st-century job market by transforming youth into highly skilled tech professionals irrespective of their educational background with its CCBP 4.0 programs. NxtWave is founded by Rahul Attuluri (Ex Amazon, IIIT Hyderabad), Sashank Reddy (IIT Bombay) and Anupam Pedarla (IIT Kharagpur). In February 2023, NxtWave raised 275 crore led by Greater Pacific Capital, a leading international private equity firm. The startup is also backed by Orios Ventures, Better Capital and marquee angels, including founders of some of India?? unicorns. NxtWave is an official partner for NSDC, under the Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship, Govt. of India, and recognized by NASSCOM, Ministry of Commerce and Industry, Govt. of India, and Startup India. The startup has received accolades as ??he Greatest Brand in Education??in a research-based listing by URS Media, a leading international media house. By offering vernacular content and interactive learning, NxtWave is breaking the entry barrier for learning tech skills. Learning in their mother tongue helps learners achieve higher comprehension, deeper attention, longer retention, and greater outcomes. NxtWave now has paid subscribers from 450+ districts across India. In just 2 years, CCBP 4.0 learners have been hired by 1500+ companies including Google, Amazon, Nvidia, Goldman Sachs, Oracle, Deloitte, and more. The scale at which we operate on the tech level  370 Cr+ learning minutes spent  69 Cr+ Code Runs  4.2 Bn. + API Requests Handled by our servers Know more about NxtWave: https://www.ccbp.in Read more about us in the news - Economic Times | CNBC | Yourstory | VCCircle About Role: Responsibilities:  Lead Nxtwave Offline Workshops: Spearhead engaging workshops, seminars, and events, specifically designed for college students, with a focus on 4.0 technologies and innovations.  Session Delivery & Engagement: Ensure dynamic delivery of workshop content, maintaining high energy and participant engagement throughout sessions.  Lead Generation & Conversion: Drive the process from captivating the audience to converting interest into seat reservations and sales-qualified leads.  Travel Readiness: Willingness to travel to colleges across the assigned territory to deliver sessions and participate in events.  Content Innovation: Continually update and innovate workshop content to align with current technological trends, especially in general AI.  YouTube Content Creation: Generate compelling YouTube content focusing on the latest tech trends and educational content for a wider audience.  Audience Engagement: Be a spontaneous speaker capable of captivating and retaining the attention of an engineering student audience through informative and entertaining presentations. Requirements:  Language Proficiency: Educational Background: Preference for candidates with an engineering background to relate to and inspire engineering students.  Experience: At least 2 years of proven experience in public speaking, with a strong portfolio of previous engagements in workshops, seminars, or related events.  Tech Enthusiasm: A genuine passion for technology and a continuous desire to stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in the field.  Public Speaking Skills: Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, alongside notable interpersonal and presentation abilities.  Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to changing schedules, environments, and technological advancements to keep content relevant and engaging.  Sales Mindset: It?? a big plus if you have a knack of sales to effectively communicate NxtWave's offerings, driving interest, and achieving sales targets. Languages Known:  Native language Telugu/Tamil to effectively communicate with a diverse student base.  Working Proficiency in English. Work Location & Working Days:  Work From Office (Hyderabad/Chennai), Involves traveling when needed.  6-Day Week Salary ( for internal reference) :  Base salary 4.5 to 6 Lacs  Retention bonus upto 1 lac  Incentives

column2: Position Overview: PPZ is seeking dynamic and driven Marketing Interns to support our vibrant Marketing department. This role is ideal for individuals eager to gain hands-on experience in the field of marketing, research, and agency coordination within the retail management sector. Key Responsibilities: - Assist in developing marketing strategies and campaigns in collaboration with the team. - Conduct market research to identify trends, competitor strategies, and customer insights. - Support coordination and communication with marketing agencies and other vendors. - Aid in the creation and management of content across various marketing channels, including digital, print, and social media. - Participate in organizing and executing events, promotions, and other marketing activities. - Help in analyzing the effectiveness of marketing initiatives and compiling reports on key metrics. - Engage in administrative duties related to the marketing department, such as scheduling, filing, and maintaining databases. - Contribute creative ideas for new marketing tactics and customer engagement. Qualifications: - Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a Bachelors degree program in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. - Strong desire to learn along with professional drive. - Solid understanding of different marketing techniques. - Excellent verbal and written communication skills. - Familiarity with marketing computer software and social media platforms. - Good understanding of the latest marketing trends and techniques. - Excellent multitasking and time-management skills. - Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment. Benefits: - Opportunity to work with a team of experienced marketing professionals. - Exposure to real-world marketing strategies and operations in the retail management sector. - A certificate of internship completion. - Potential to receive a full-time oTer based on performance. Join PPZ and step into a world where your marketing career can flourish. We look forward to welcoming you aboard!

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Clients servicing executive to join our organization. Develop and execute a comprehensive business development plan to achieve your goals and revenue for the BTL activation. 2. Identify and pursue new business opportunities (if any) through market research, prospecting, and lead generation activities. 3. Build and maintain a strong pipeline of potential clients, consistently following up to convert leads into loyal customers. 4. Conduct in-depth analysis of client requirements, prepare customized proposals, and deliver persuasive presentations to win new projects and contracts. 5. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless execution of BTL activation campaigns, meeting client expectations and delivering exceptional results. 6. Establish and nurture long-term client relationships, maintaining regular communication to understand their evolving needs and provide continuous support. 7. Stay updated with industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging opportunities to maintain a competitive edge in the market. 8. Develop and maintain a thorough understanding of the BTL activation agencys services, capabilities, and offerings to effectively represent the agency to clients and partners. 9. Attend industry events, conferences, and networking sessions to promote the agency, expand professional connections, and explore potential collaborations. 10. Prepare regular reports on sales performance, business development activities, and market insights, presenting findings to the management team.

column1: Opening at IndoBevs - Senior Executive - Trade Marketing
column2: Defined Roles Responsibilities: Development, Ideation, and Implementation of Trade Marketing Collaterals: Lead the creation and execution of trade marketing materials in alignment with brand objectives. Ensure collaterals effectively communicate the brand message and meet marketing goals. Collaborate with the creative team to design visually appealing and impactful marketing materials. Contribution to ATL/BTL Marketing Activities and Events: Participate in planning and executing Above-the-Line (ATL) and Below-the-Line (BTL) marketing campaigns. Coordinate and manage events, promotions, and other marketing activities to enhance brand visibility and sales. Work closely with the sales and brand teams to integrate trade marketing strategies with overall marketing plans. Vendor Development and Management, Retail Branding, and Collateral Logistics: Identify, evaluate, and establish relationships with vendors, event organizers, and marketing agencies. Negotiate contracts to ensure the best value and quality of services provided. Manage retail branding strategies to enhance brand presence at retail outlets. Oversee the logistics, distribution, and assortment of trade marketing materials. Monitoring of Marketing Warehouse and Conducting Field Audit Checks: Oversee the operations of the marketing warehouse, ensuring proper storage and handling of materials. Implement inventory management practices to track stock levels and usage. Conduct field audits to assess the visibility and effectiveness of trade marketing activities. Provide feedback and recommendations to improve the execution of marketing strategies. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. Relevant trade marketing experience in any field will be a plus. Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint. Ability to manage multiple projects with different objectives simultaneously. Strong negotiation skills to secure the best value with vendors, event organizers, and marketing agencies. Openness to travel across India to guide sales teams in the implementation of collaterals and audits.
